summary.span: 表示一个由可移动条组成的控件，该可移动条将容器的显示区域分成两个大小可调的面板。

span.span: Represents a control consisting of a movable bar that divides a container's display area into two resizable panels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将控件添加到两个大小可调的面板中，并且你可以添加其他控件添加到现有以创建多个可调整大小的面板显示区域。You can add controls to the two resizable panels, and you can add other controls to existing panels to create many resizable display areas. 使用将容器的显示区域的控件 (如)，并允许用户调整大小添加到控件面板。Use the control to divide the display area of a container (such as a ) and allow the user to resize controls that are added to the panels. 当用户将鼠标指针移过拆分器，光标会改变，则指示内的控件可以调整控件的大小。When the user passes the mouse pointer over the splitter, the cursor changes to indicate that the controls inside the control can be resized. > [!NOTE] > 以前版本的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]仅支持控件。Previous versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] only support the control. 在设计时，还简化了控件放置。 also eases control placement at design time. 例如，若要创建类似于 Windows 资源管理器窗口，添加控制转移到并设置其属性`DockStyle.Fill`。For example, to create a window similar to Windows Explorer, add a control to a and set its property to `DockStyle.Fill`. 添加控制转移到并设置其属性`DockStyle.Fill`。Add a control to the and set its property to `DockStyle.Fill`. 若要完成布局，添加控件并设置其属性`DockStyle.Fill`能够上占用剩余的空间。To complete the layout, add a control and set its property to `DockStyle.Fill` to have the occupy the remaining space on the . 在运行时，用户可以然后调整大小的两个使用拆分器控件的宽度。At run time, the user can then resize the width of both controls using the splitter. 使用属性指定与应不调整控件或其他容器。Use the property to specify that a control should not be resized along with the or other container. 使用指定其中拆分器将启动窗体上。Use to specify where the splitter starts on your form. 使用指定像素数拆分器移动一次。Use to specify how many pixels the splitter moves at a time. 默认值为为一个像素。The default for is one pixel. 使用和来指定如何关闭的拆分栏可以移到外缘面板。Use and to specify how close the splitter bar can be moved to the outside edge of a panel. 面板的默认最小大小为 25 像素。The default minimum size of a panel is 25 pixels. 使用属性指定水平方向。Use the property to specify horizontal orientation. 默认方向为垂直。The default orientation of the is vertical. 使用属性指定的边框样式并协调其边框样式与你将添加到的控件的边框样式。Use the property to specify the border style of the and coordinate its border style with the border style of controls that you add to the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的垂直和水平。The following code example shows both a vertical and horizontal . 垂直拆分器以 10 像素的增量移动。The vertical splitter moves in 10-pixel increments. 垂直的左的面板包含控件，并且其右面板包含水平。The left panel of the vertical contains a control, and its right panel contains a horizontal . 这两个水平的面板将填入控件和顶部面板指，以便它不调整大小，当您调整容器。Both panels of the horizontal are filled with controls, and the top panel is defined as a so that it does not resize when you resize the container. 移动垂直拆分器将引发事件，表示在此示例中的游标样式发生更改。Moving the vertical splitter raises the event, signified in this example by a change to the cursor style. 时停止移动拆分器将引发事件。The event is raised when you stop moving the splitter. 这是由还原为默认的游标样式表示在此示例中。This is signified in this example by the cursor style reverting to the default. span.span: A value that represents the height and width, in pixels, of the auto-scroll margin.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自动滚动边距是任何子控件和可滚动父控件的边缘之间的距离。The auto-scroll margin is the distance between any child controls and the edges of the scrollable parent control. 大小添加到要确定是否需要滚动条的可滚动控件中包含任何子控件的大小。The size is added to the size of any child controls contained in the scrollable control to determine if scroll bars are needed. 属性时调整父可滚动控件的或各个子控件放入视图中，计算和用于确定是否必须显示滚动条。The property is evaluated when the parent scrollable control is resized or the individual child controls are brought into view, and is used to determine if scroll bars must be displayed. 停靠的控件被不确定是否必须显示滚动条的计算。Docked controls are excluded from the calculations that determine if scroll bars must be displayed. 如果到父可滚动控件的子控件的边缘的距离小于赋予的值属性和属性设置为`true`，显示相应的滚动条。If the distance from the edge of a child control to the parent scrollable control is less than the value assigned to the property and the property is set to `true`, the appropriate scroll bar is displayed. 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant to this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的内容可能会更改原因有很多;包括显示数据更改;添加子控件;布局和空白区更改;或系统字体、 语言或解决方法更改。The contents of a control may change for many reasons; including display data changes; addition of child controls; layout and padding changes; or system font, language, or resolution changes. 如果属性设置为`true`、将自动调整大小以覆盖其内容，尽管它将永远不会被重新调整为小于其原始。If the property is set to `true`, the will resize automatically to encompass its contents, although it will never be resized to be smaller than its original . 此操作将保持该控件的。This operation will maintain the control’s . 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant to this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将引发此事件通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改属性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`SplitContainer1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取或设置附加到容器边缘的 边框。

span.span: Gets or sets which borders are attached to the edges of the container.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将停靠可以停靠到其容器，或你的任何边缘到容器的所有边缘以便完全填充容器。You can dock a to any edge of its container, or you can dock a to all edges of the container so that the entirely fills the container. 例如，将此属性设置为要附加的左边的缘到其容器的左边缘。For example, set this property to to attach the left edge of the to the left edge of its container. 控件停靠在 z 顺序。Controls are docked in z-order. > [!NOTE] > Z 顺序对应于的深度维度的屏幕，而 x 顺序和 y 顺序对应于水平和垂直维度中，分别。The z-order corresponds to the depth dimension of the screen, and the x-order and y-order corresponds to the horizontal and vertical dimensions, respectively. Z 顺序定义的对象的前面，显示在控件或 windows 可以重叠或占用相同的空间，在屏幕上的情况下。Z-order defines which object appears in front of which, in cases where controls or windows can overlap or occupy the same space on the screen. 控件或窗口顶部的 z 顺序出现在所有其他控件或 windows 顶部且由 0 中的索引引用属性。A control or window at the top of the z-order appears on top of all other controls or windows and is referenced by an index of 0 in the property. 控件或窗口底部的 z 顺序的所有其他控件或窗口下方会显示且由的索引引用`(Controls.Count-1)`中属性。A control or window at the bottom of the z-order appears underneath all other controls or windows and is referenced by an index of `(Controls.Count-1)` in the property. 锚定和停靠的控件有关的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 用 Windows 窗体创建 Multipane 用户界面](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-multipane-user-interface-with-windows-forms.md)。For more information about anchoring and docking controls, see [How to: Create a Multipane User Interface with Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-multipane-user-interface-with-windows-forms.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个垂直拆分器其属性设置为`Fill`。The following code example shows a vertical splitter whose property is set to `Fill`. 此外显示了垂直拆分器的其他基本属性。Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来启用或禁用拆分器移动。Use the property to enable or disable splitter movement. 例如，你可以以编程方式将设置到`true`当一些其他控件具有焦点时进行刷新显示，或者事件时就发生的显示区域除以必须保持不变，设置到`false`不适用于这些情况下时。For example, you might programmatically set to `true` when refreshing the display, when some other control has the focus, or when an event is occurring for which the display areas divided by the must remain constant, and set to `false` when those circumstances do not apply.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移动拆分器之后，将引发事件。The event is raised after the splitter has been moved. 当正在移动，使用事件和事件处理程序。When the is in the process of moving, use the event and the event handler. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例引发事件，当移动拆分器的游标样式更改由表示在此示例中。The following code example raises the event, signified in this example by a change to the cursor style when you move the splitter. 时停止移动拆分器将引发事件。The event is raised when you stop moving the splitter. 这是由还原为默认的游标样式表示在此示例中。This is signified in this example by the cursor style reverting to the default. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性配置垂直的左的面板或水平的顶部面板。Use the property to configure the left panel of a vertical or the top panel of a horizontal . 例如，可以通过更改的值指定面板的最小大小属性，设置属性`Panel1`以便容器的大小调整，或可以获取或设置面板的时，该面板保持相同的大小和属性。For example, you can specify the minimum size of the panel by changing the value of the property, set the property to `Panel1` so that the panel remains the same size when the container is resized, or you can get or set the panel's and properties. 无法删除从。You cannot remove from the . > [!NOTE] > 如果或包含任何可以接收焦点时，焦点将保留在单击时其拆分器上的控件。If or contains no control that can receive the focus, the focus remains on the splitter when it is clicked. 若要更改的焦点或，将其设置属性为 0 和属性为 1。To change the focus to or , set the property of to 0 and the property of to 1. 如果或包含任何可以接收焦点时，焦点将保留在单击时其拆分器上的控件。If or contains no control that can receive the focus, the focus remains on the splitter when it is clicked. 若要更改的焦点或，将其设置属性为 0 和属性为 1。To change the focus to or , set the property of to 0 and the property of to 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以防止拆分器移动太靠近容器的向左或顶部边缘。Use the property to prevent the splitter from moving too close to the left or top edge of the container. 例如，你可能想要阻止的显示区域的某些被遮盖。For example, you might want to prevent some of the display area of a from being covered. 如果属性是`Vertical`（默认值）、从左边缘以像素为单位的拆分器返回的最小距离。If the property is `Vertical` (the default), returns the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the left edge of . 如果属性是`Horizontal`，从上边缘，以像素为单位的拆分器返回的最小距离。If the property is `Horizontal`, returns the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the top edge of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个垂直拆分器其中的最小大小（左的面板） 设置为 30 个像素，但现在却拆分器可以从容器的左边缘的最小距离。The following code example shows a vertical splitter where the minimum size of (the left panel) is set to 30 pixels, which is now the minimum distance the splitter can be from the left edge of the container. 此外显示了垂直拆分器的其他基本属性。Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以防止拆分器移动太靠近容器的右侧或底部边缘。Use the property to prevent the splitter from moving too close to the right or bottom edge of the container. 例如，你可能想要阻止的显示区域的某些被遮盖。For example, you might want to prevent some of the display area of a from being covered. 如果属性是`Vertical`（默认值）、以拆分器可以来自的右边缘的像素为单位返回的最小距离。If the property is `Vertical` (the default), returns the minimum distance in pixels that the splitter can be from the right edge of . 如果属性是`Horizontal`，以拆分器可以从下边缘的像素为单位返回的最小距离。If the property is `Horizontal`, returns the minimum distance in pixels that the splitter can be from the bottom edge of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个垂直拆分器其中的最小大小（右面板） 设置为 20 像素，但现在却拆分器可以从容器的右边缘的最小距离。The following code example shows a vertical splitter where the minimum size of (the right panel) is set to 20 pixels, which is now the minimum distance the splitter can be from the right edge of the container. 此外显示了垂直拆分器的其他基本属性。Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在消息预处理以处理对话框的按键字符，如选项卡、 向左箭头、 向右键、 向上键和向下箭头过程中调用此方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog box key characters, such as TAB, LEFT ARROW, RIGHT ARROW, UP ARROW, and DOWN ARROW. 不处理包含 ALT 或控件修饰符的键。Keys that include the ALT or CONTROL modifiers are not handled. 仅当调用此方法方法指示控件未在处理该键。This method is called only if the method indicates that the control is not processing the key. 只需将字符发送到父级的方法或返回`false`如果控件具有没有父级。The simply sends the character to the parent's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 类重写此方法以执行实际处理对话框键。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys. 仅当控件承载在 Windows 窗体应用程序或作为 ActiveX 控件时，运行的时将调用此方法。The run time calls this method only when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按 TAB 键时，则会将输入的焦点设置为窗体的 tab 键顺序的下一个控件。When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order of the form. 设置到`true`以以便与箭头键以及鼠标时，才可以将它移到拆分器将输入的焦点。Set to `true` to give input focus to a splitter so that it can be moved with the arrow keys as well as with the mouse. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，则设置到`false`排除拆分器以及任何中包含的控件从的控件的 tab 键顺序的集合。Starting in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], setting to `false` excludes the splitter and any of the controls that are contained in the from the collection of controls in the tab order. 若要使控件能够通过使用 TAB 键获得焦点，创建继承自控件。To enable controls to get focus by using the TAB key, create a control that inherits from . 创建名为的新属性`TabStop`，并重写方法。Create a new property named `TabStop` and override the method. 下面的示例演示如何实现此目的。The following example demonstrates how to accomplish this.
